column9: If APRAXSP= 1, SPEECH should not be 0
column10: If B8 Q4q. APRAXSP (Apraxia of speech) = 1 (present), then Q1. SPEECH (Speech) should not be 0 (Normal)

column9: If MASKING= 1, FACEXP should not be 0
column10: If B8 Q3m. MASKING (Facial expression) = 1 (present), then Q2. FACEXP (Facial expression) should not be 0 (Normal)

column9: If RIGDLORT or RIGDLOLF = 4, GAIT should not be 0
column10: If Q5d. RIGDLORT (Rigidity - right lower extremity) or Q5e. RIGDLOLF (Rigidity - left lower extremity) = 4 (Severe - range of motion achieved with difficulty), then Q12. GAIT (gait) should not be 0 (Normal)
column11: If RIGDLORT or RIGDLOLF = 4 and GAIT = 0

column9: If STOOPED= 1, POSTURE should not be 0
column10: If B8 Q3n. STOOPED (Stooped posture) = 1 (present), then Q11. POSTURE (Posture) should not be 0 (Normal)

column9: If GAITABN= 1, GAIT should not be 0
column10: If B8 Q5. GAITABN (Gait) = 1 (present), then Q12. GAIT (Gait) should not be 0 (Normal)

column9: If POSTINST= 1, POSSTAB should not be 0
column10: If B8 Q3l. POSTINST (Postural instability) = 1 (present), then Q13. POSSTAB (Posture stability) should not be 0 (Normal)

column9: If all of (SPEECH, FACEXP, TRESTFAC, TRESTRHD, TRESTLHD, TRESTRFT, TRESTLFT, TRACTRHD, TRACTLHD, RIGDNECK, RIGDUPRT, RIGDUPLF, RIGDLORT, RIGDLOLF, TAPSRT, TAPSLF, HANDMOVR, HANDMOVL, HANDALTR, HANDALTL, LEGRT, LEGLF, ARISING, POSTURE, GAIT, POSSTAB, BRADYKIN) ne 8, then TOTALUPDRS must = sum of SPEECH, FACEXP, TRESTFAC, TRESTRHD, TRESTLHD, TRESTRFT, TRESTLFT, TRACTRHD, TRACTLHD, RIGDNECK, RIGDUPRT, RIGDUPLF, RIGDLORT, RIGDLOLF, TAPSRT, TAPSLF, HANDMOVR, HANDMOVL, HANDALTR, HANDALTL, LEGRT, LEGLF, ARISING, POSTURE, GAIT, POSSTAB, BRADYKIN
column10: If all of (SPEECH, FACEXP, TRESTFAC, TRESTRHD, TRESTLHD, TRESTRFT, TRESTLFT, TRACTRHD, TRACTLHD, RIGDNECK, RIGDUPRT, RIGDUPLF, RIGDLORT, RIGDLOLF, TAPSRT, TAPSLF, HANDMOVR, HANDMOVL, HANDALTR, HANDALTL, LEGRT, LEGLF, ARISING, POSTURE, GAIT, POSSTAB, BRADYKIN) ne 8, then TOTALUPDRS must = sum of SPEECH, FACEXP, TRESTFAC, TRESTRHD, TRESTLHD, TRESTRFT, TRESTLFT, TRACTRHD, TRACTLHD, RIGDNECK, RIGDUPRT, RIGDUPLF, RIGDLORT, RIGDLOLF, TAPSRT, TAPSLF, HANDMOVR, HANDMOVL, HANDALTR, HANDALTL, LEGRT, LEGLF, ARISING, POSTURE, GAIT, POSSTAB, BRADYKIN
column11: If all of (SPEECH, FACEXP, TRESTFAC, TRESTRHD, TRESTLHD, TRESTRFT, TRESTLFT, TRACTRHD, TRACTLHD, RIGDNECK, RIGDUPRT, RIGDUPLF, RIGDLORT, RIGDLOLF, TAPSRT, TAPSLF, HANDMOVR, HANDMOVL, HANDALTR, HANDALTL, LEGRT, LEGLF, ARISING, POSTURE, GAIT, POSSTAB, BRADYKIN) ne 8 and TOTALUPDRS ne sum of (SPEECH, FACEXP, TRESTFAC, TRESTRHD, TRESTLHD, TRESTRFT, TRESTLFT, TRACTRHD, TRACTLHD, RIGDNECK, RIGDUPRT, RIGDUPLF, RIGDLORT, RIGDLOLF, TAPSRT, TAPSLF, HANDMOVR, HANDMOVL, HANDALTR, HANDALTL, LEGRT, LEGLF, ARISING, POSTURE, GAIT, POSSTAB, BRADYKIN)
column13: TOTALUPDRS, SPEECH, FACEXP, TRESTFAC, TRESTRHD, TRESTLHD, TRESTRFT, TRESTLFT, TRACTRHD, TRACTLHD, RIGDNECK, RIGDUPRT, RIGDUPLF, RIGDLORT, RIGDLOLF, TAPSRT, TAPSLF, HANDMOVR, HANDMOVL, HANDALTR, HANDALTL, LEGRT, LEGLF, ARISING, POSTURE, GAIT, POSSTAB, BRADYKIN

column8: PDNORMAL compared to LBD module Form B3L results
column9: If PDNORMAL=1 then all of the following variables should =0: LBUMSPCH, LBUMFACE, LBUMTRFA, LBUMTRRH, LBUMTRLH, LBUMTRRF, LBUMTRLF, LBUMATRH, LBUMATLH, LBUMRGNK, LBUMRGRU, LBUMRGLU, LBUMRGRL, LBUMRGLL, LBUMFTRH, LBUMFTLH, LBUMHMRH, LBUMHMLH, LBUMPSRH, LBUMPSLH, LBUMLGRL, LBUMLGLL, LBUMRISE, LBUMPOST, LBUMGAIT, LBUPSTBL, LBUMBRAD
column10: If Q0. PDNORMAL=1 (UPDRS examination is normal) then all of the following variables in LBD module Form B3L should =0: Q1. LBUMSPCH, Q2. LBUMFACE, Q3a. LBUMTRFA, Q3b. LBUMTRRH, Q3c. LBUMTRLH, Q3d. LBUMTRRF, Q3e. LBUMTRLF, Q4a. LBUMATRH, Q4b. LBUMATLH, Q5a. LBUMRGNK, Q5b. LBUMRGRU, Q5c. LBUMRGLU, Q5d. LBUMRGRL, Q5e. LBUMRGLL, Q6a. LBUMFTRH, Q6b. LBUMFTLH, Q7a. LBUMHMRH, Q7b. LBUMHMLH, Q8a. LBUMPSRH, Q8b. LBUMPSLH, Q9a. LBUMLGRL, Q9b. LBUMLGLL, Q10. LBUMRISE, Q11. LBUMPOST, Q12. LBUMGAIT, Q13. LBUPSTBL, Q14. LBUMBRAD
